message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an investment that truly stands out and offers unparalleled value. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than what you're expecting. Considering its actual worth and the benefits it brings, I'm offering it to you for $18000. This price reflects not only the product's quality but also the opportunity cost for you to acquire such a valuable asset. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can enhance your business or personal endeavors.
